short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add-on for enabling web automation tasks. This web extension is compatible with FIS Task Automation for version 5.5.7 or later

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FIS Task Automation Extension

FIS Task Automation allows you to automate manual processes and tasks on your computer.

This powerful browser extension is designed to streamline and automate your web-based tasks, enhancing productivity and efficiency. It helps you create and run browser automations effortlessly.

Install the extension to automate tasks such as web scripting, data extraction, web app testing, filling out web forms, and more. 
This extension is compatible with FIS Task Automation for desktop version 5.5.7 or later.
